Question 144) A special Christmas show had 45,000 tickets sold. This event will take place at a soccer stadium that will provide 5 entrance gates, with 4 electronic turnstiles per gate. In each of these turnstiles, it will pass a single person every 2 seconds. The public was also divided by the number of gates and turnstiles, indicated in the ticket to the show, for the effective entry into the stadium. Suppose all those who bought tickets will go to the show and that everyone will pass the indicated electronic gates and turnstiles.
What is the minimum time for everyone to pass through the turnstiles?
A) 1 hour.
B) 1 hour and 15 minutes.
C) 5 hours.
D) 6 hours.
E) 6 hours and 15 minutes.
